title: I took a screenshot while on facebook and somehow activated this annoying voice. Assistant?
content: I took a screenshot on Facebook and now I have this annoying voice in control of my navigation on my phone. Can't go anywhere without having to  "double tap" to activate! It repeats everything twice! Can't get to my icons/apps easily. Want to disable or get rid of it If I could figure out what it is!
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 2
